salary.title: Salary Take-Home Calculator
salary.description: Enter your salary to calculate the actual amount you can receive after deducting 4 major insurances, income tax, and local income tax.

input.nonTaxableDesc: Meal allowance, transportation, childcare leave benefit, etc.

yearEndTax.title: Year-end Tax Settlement Preparation
yearEndTax.content: Collect medical expenses, education expenses, and donation receipts in advance to receive more tax credits in year-end tax settlement.

taxSaving.title: Tax Saving Methods
taxSaving.content: You can increase your take-home pay by utilizing tax credit benefits such as IRP and pension savings.

table.title: Take-Home Salary Table by Annual Income
table.description: From 20 million to 200 million KRW in 1 million KRW increments

points.0: Calculated in 1 million KRW increments from 20 million to 200 million KRW
points.1: The higher the take-home ratio, the lower the tax burden
points.2: For high income earners, the take-home ratio decreases due to progressive tax rates
points.3: Actual take-home pay may increase further with additional deductions during year-end tax settlement

guide.title: Salary Calculation Master Guide
guide.subtitle: From new employees to executives! A complete guide to mastering everything about salary calculation. We'll tell you all the secrets to increase your take-home pay, from 4 major insurances to year-end tax settlement!

accurate.title: Latest 2025 Tax Law
accurate.description: Accurate calculation based on National Tax Service official data, reflecting 4 major insurance premiums, income tax rates, and various deductions in real-time!

0.title: Accurate 4 major insurance premiums
0.content: Health insurance 3.545%, National pension 4.5%, Employment insurance 0.9% accurately reflected

1.title: 6-tier progressive tax rate
1.content: Accurate tax rate application by income bracket from 6% to 45%

2.title: Various tax credits
2.content: Perfect calculation including work income tax credit and child tax credit

smart.title: Smart Analysis System
smart.description: Smart salary analysis beyond simple calculation! See everything from effective tax rate to tax-saving points at a glance.
points: Effective tax rate analysis: Check the actual tax payment ratio at a glance
Tax-saving guide: Customized proposals for utilizing non-taxable income and income deductions
Salary comparison table: Take-home pay by bracket from 20 million to 200 million KRW at a glance

practical.title: Practical Optimization Tools
practical.description: From HR teams to individuals! Maximize work efficiency with convenient features that can be used directly in practice.
points: Calculation history management: Save and compare multiple scenarios for analysis
URL sharing: Easily share calculation results via URL
Responsive design: Perfect anywhere - PC, tablet, mobile

points.0: Work income deduction: Progressive deduction applied according to total salary
points.1: 4 major insurances: Health insurance 3.545%, National pension 4.5% (cap 80.52 million KRW), Employment insurance 0.9%
points.2: Long-term care insurance: 12.27% of health insurance premium
points.4: Work income tax credit and child tax credit reflected
points.5: Refund possible with additional deductions during year-end tax settlement

considerations.0: Set monthly payment within 30% of monthly income
considerations.1: Higher down payment reduces monthly payment
considerations.2: Longer loan term increases total interest
considerations.3: Choose optimal conditions through interest rate comparison

carTax.description: Calculate various taxes accurately when purchasing a car

guide.title: Acquisition & Registration Tax Guide

3.title: Note

bmi.title: BMI Calculator
bmi.description: Calculate your Body Mass Index (BMI) to start healthy weight management

meaning.0: BMI is an obesity index calculated from height and weight
meaning.1: Used as a reference indicator for overall health status
meaning.2: Has limitations as it doesn't reflect muscle mass, bone density, etc.
meaning.3: Observe weight changes through regular measurements

management.0: Balanced diet and regular exercise are important
management.1: Steady management is more effective than rapid weight changes
management.2: Consult with professionals considering individual differences
management.3: Stress management and adequate sleep are also necessary

1.title: Accurate Measurement
1.content: Measure in the morning on an empty stomach for the most accurate results.

2.title: Regular Check
2.content: Measure regularly 1-2 times per month to observe change trends.

3.title: Goal Setting
3.content: Set a step-by-step plan targeting a healthy BMI range.

diet.title: Balanced Diet
diet.content: Properly distribute protein, carbohydrates, and fats in your intake.

exercise.title: Regular Exercise
exercise.content: Recommended 3-5 times per week, 30+ minutes of aerobic exercise.

sleep.title: Adequate Sleep
sleep.content: 7-8 hours of quality sleep daily helps with weight management.

water.title: Sufficient Hydration
water.content: Drink 8+ glasses of water daily to boost metabolism.

riskTable.title: BMI and Health Risk

obese2.concerns: Metabolic syndrome, joint disease, sleep apnea

riskTable.note: * Individual differences may apply. Consult medical professionals for accurate diagnosis.

classification.title: BMI Classification Standards
classification.note: * Asian standards applied, separate criteria for 65+ years

bmi.placeholder: BMI calculation results will appear when you enter height and weight

calorie.title: Calorie Calculator
calorie.description: Calculate your Basal Metabolic Rate (BMR) and Total Daily Energy Expenditure (TDEE) to set healthy weight management goals

input.title: Body Information & Goal Setting
input.targetWeightNote: Enter to calculate time to goal

bmr.0: The minimum energy required to sustain life
bmr.1: Used for heart beating, breathing, temperature regulation, etc.
bmr.2: Accounts for 60-70% of total energy expenditure
bmr.3: Decreases with age and lower muscle mass

calorie.0: Approximately 7700 kcal deficit needed to lose 1kg
calorie.1: Healthy weight loss is 0.5-1kg per week
calorie.2: Combining exercise and diet control is most effective

exerciseCalories.title: Exercise Calorie Burn (30 minutes)
exerciseCalories.note: * Based on 70kg adult male, individual differences may apply.

calorie.placeholder: Calorie calculation results will appear when you enter body information

bodyFat.title: Body Fat Calculator
bodyFat.description: Calculate accurate body fat percentage using Navy and YMCA formulas and analyze your body composition

input.title: Body Information & Measurements
input.neckNote: Measure just below the Adam's apple
input.hipNote: Measure at the widest part of the hips

classification.title: Body Fat Classification Chart
classification.note: Ideal body fat ranges may vary by age group. Consult with a professional for accurate diagnosis.

measurement.0: Morning measurements on an empty stomach are most accurate
measurement.1: Place the tape measure lightly against the skin
measurement.3: Take multiple measurements and use the average

management.0: Balanced diet and regular exercise are fundamental
management.1: Strength training to increase muscle mass reduces body fat percentage
management.2: Aim for gradual changes rather than rapid weight loss
management.3: Adequate sleep and stress management are also important

measurementGuide.title: Accurate Circumference Measurement Methods

waistTips.3: Place lightly against skin, don't squeeze

neckTips.0: Measure at the narrowest part of the neck
neckTips.3: Don't extend or retract the neck

hipTips.0: Measure at the widest part of the hips

measurementGuide.measurementTipText: Morning measurements after using the bathroom and before eating provide the most accurate results.

bodyFat.placeholder: Body fat calculation results will appear when you enter body information and measurements

workHours.title: Work Hours Calculator
workHours.description: Calculate accurate part-time wages according to Korean Labor Standards Act! Automatically calculate basic pay, overtime pay, weekly holiday pay, and extended work allowances

overtime.0: 1.5x overtime pay for work exceeding 8 hours/day or 40 hours/week
overtime.1: Additional 0.5x pay for night work (10 PM - 6 AM)
overtime.2: Overtime work up to 12 hours/week with worker consent
overtime.3: Night and holiday work prohibited for workers under 18

allowance.0: Weekly holiday pay: 1 paid holiday guaranteed for 15+ hours/week
allowance.1: Holiday work: 1.5x pay for work on legal holidays
allowance.2: Annual leave: 15 days after 1 year, +1 day for perfect attendance
allowance.3: 4 major insurances: Mandatory for 60+ hours/month workers

minimumWage.title: 2024 Minimum Wage Information
minimumWage.note: * Minimum 90% of minimum wage required during probation period

basic.0: Employment contract creation and delivery (wage, working hours specified)
basic.1: Wages paid directly at least once monthly on fixed dates
basic.2: Wages paid within 14 days of resignation date
basic.3: Protection from unfair dismissal and disciplinary actions

protection.0: Report and consult at Ministry of Employment and Labor (1350)
protection.1: Submit wage complaint to Regional Employment and Labor Office
protection.2: Apply for living expense loans with unpaid wage confirmation
protection.3: Claim damages and late interest for unpaid wages

lotto.title: Lotto Number Generator
lotto.description: Generate lottery 6/45 numbers automatically and create better number combinations with past winning number analysis

settings.title: Generation Settings
settings.excludeDesc: Click to select numbers to exclude

methods.statisticsDesc: Apply weights based on past winning number frequency analysis
methods.mixedDesc: Balanced selection combining random and statistical methods

methods.0: Complete Random: All numbers are selected with equal probability
methods.1: Statistics Based: Higher weights given to numbers with higher past winning frequency
methods.2: Mixed Method: Combines random and statistical methods for balance

tips.0: Use the exclude numbers feature to remove unwanted numbers
tips.1: Generate multiple games at once to see various combinations
tips.2: Save generation history to review later

reminders.0: All number combinations have equal winning probability
reminders.1: Past statistics do not guarantee future results

stats.title: Winning Probability Information
stats.disclaimer: * All number combinations have equal winning probability, and past statistics do not guarantee future results.

lotto.placeholder: Select settings and press the generate numbers button

ladder.description: Enjoy online ladder game with friends! Make fair decisions for various situations like determining order, penalties, and team division

usage.0: Enter participants and outcomes, then generate a ladder
usage.1: Press the start game button to watch the animation
usage.2: Check the results and share them

examples.0: Determine order: Presentation order, cleaning duty assignment
examples.1: Set penalties: Decide penalties in drinking games and party games
examples.2: Team division: Form sports teams, group project teams

tips.1: Adjust animation speed for more fun
tips.2: Save results to check them later
